Html:
I finished installing all the dependencies for Goblin XNA3.4
While I am able to run the tutorial projects, When I try to run the dominoes projects and Tutorial8 - optical marker tracker project, I get the error -
" error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'DirectShowCapture' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)"

I guess DirectShow is already included with Goblin XNA with the new release, when I tried to add a reference to DShowNET.dll, it said, the reference is already included.

Can anyone help me out with this please? I am currently trying to decide on best game engine to perform AR.

Pradeep

Are you using the latest release? Make sure the class DirectShowCapture exists under GoblinXNA.Device.Capture directory. It might have been named to DirectShowCapture2 by mistake if you had downloaded v3.4 a while ago.

Ohan
